english.segment1: Dear Lord, this pain inside me. Tears me apart. And Lord the more it hurts. The harder my heart
english.segment2: Oh, in my darkest hour. Your love comes shining through. Your word is true and You make all things new. And I know You're all I need. You say You're here and You calm my fears. And i know You'll never leave
english.segment3: Dear Lord, my heart is breaking. Breaking in two. And Lord my spirit's torn and. Crushed without You
english.segment4: Higher than the stars that shine. And deeper than the sea. Is my Savior's precious love. Your love has set me free. Set me free
